title: Tarantino says Thurman movie car crash among 'biggest regrets'
text:
Tarantino says Thurman movie car crash among 'biggest regrets' 12:57pm GMT - 01:02 
'Kill Bill' director denies forcing his lead actress to carry out the car stunt which left Thurman badly injured, but regrets it happening. Lisa Giles-Keddie reports. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
'Kill Bill' director denies forcing his lead actress to carry out the car stunt which left Thurman badly injured, but regrets it happening. Lisa Giles-Keddie reports. Press CTRL+C (Windows), CMD+C (Mac), or long-press the URL below on your mobile device to copy the code https://reut.rs/2BLCQJ1
